amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for Air Force Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation by $1 billion.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 19 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996, to reduce funds appropriated in the bill for Air Force research and development by $1 billion. The intent of the amendment is to eliminate funding for research and development for the F-22.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 307 (Roll no. 242).
